explains: adj. 巨大的；天大的；异常的
vt. 猛打；痛击（whop 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: The Russian leader won a whopping 89.9 percent yes vote.
sentences.cn: 这位俄罗斯领导人赢得了89.9%的高票支持。

sentences.en: In Club Penguin, the market leader, which was bought by Disney in 2007 for a whopping $700 million.
sentences.cn: 市场领导者企鹅俱乐部于2007年被迪斯尼以7亿美元的高价收购。

sentences.en: Inflation remains high at a whopping 17%.
